body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.11 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Numerous fixes for IE7 support.
Support for 64-bit cross-compile using Mingw64.
User interface support for crypto certificates.
Better support for MSI installation patches.
Various Direct3D optimizations.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
